column4: you can put iptables configuration lines in /etc/network/interfaces - in the "iface eth0" block, put "pre-up /sbin/iptables <arguments>" lines
i can put it indented under the "iface lo inet loopback", right? the iptables rules relate to lo
I believe so.  I use a "pre-up" line indented there.  I don't know if the indentation serves any purpose other than looking nice though.
